潘.definition: surname Pan; Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes

潘基文.definition: Ban Ki Moon (1944-), Korean diplomat, UN secretary-general 2007-2016

潘岳.definition: Pan Yue (247-300), later known as 潘安[Pan1 An1], prominent Western Jin poet, also famous for his good looks, such that his name became a byword for "extremely handsome man"

潘金蓮.definition: Pan Jinlian (name lit. Golden Lotus), heroine of Ming dynasty vernacular novel Jinpingmei or the Golden Lotus 金瓶梅

潘集.definition: Panji, a district of Huainan City 淮南市[Huai2nan2 Shi4], Anhui

潘集區.definition: Panji, a district of Huainan City 淮南市[Huai2nan2 Shi4], Anhui
